Text.Value: *Mystra has already spoken. There is nothing else for you here.*
Make an offering to Mystra.
*You're not sure what you expected. After all, she's not deigned to speak with you for some time.*
*Mystra, Goddess of Magic, is offended that you would rob her altar. Her disapproval hovers heavily around you - best to keep your hands to yourself.*
Beseech a blessing from Mystra.
*The amount you've offered proves your faith and devotion. You may now pray here once a day for a divine blessing.*
*Your offering is accepted, but more evidence of devotion is required.*
Read the words inscribed on the altar.
Whatever you want with this idol, I'd prefer we make it quick. I'm not sure I'm comfortable catching Mystra's eye, even if it is made of stone.
Trust me - it will take a lot more than a few gold pieces and some fervent thoughts to convince Mystra to break her silence. On my account, at least.
*Mystra, Mother of All Magic, is the patron of wizards, and often called upon by other spellcasters as well. She's said to be a jealous goddess.*
Commune with her as you see fit. She's your goddess, and I've no wish to stand between you and any blessing she might deign to offer.
Commune with her as you see fit. I've no wish to stand between you and any inspiration she might deign to offer.
You don't want to make an offering? A prayer of some kind?
Leave.
Show reverence before your deity and open your soul to their divine power.
*Mystra's idol stands before you, as silent as the goddess herself.*
*You see an altar dedicated to Mystra.*
*The Mistress of Magic blesses you with an enhanced attunement to the Weave. Praise her!*
*Your studies of Religion don't suffice to tell you more.*
*As her cleric, even standing in her statue's presence makes you feel more sensitive to the Weave, and to her power.*
*If your refusal to detonate the orb did not get her attention, perhaps pursuing the crown will. But until then, it seems you are on your own.*
*Even though you do not follow her, you feel her power resonating from the statue. She is the One True Spell at the heart of all spells. The Weave could not be in better hands.*
*Mystra is attentive - the Lady of Magic welcomes your presence.*

Synopsis: Dialog when interactin with the shrine dedicated to Mystra in Stormshore Tabernacle. All players will be able to read some lore about the god. Additionally, if the player is a cleric of Mystra they'll be able to give offerings and pray/communicate with the god to get a blessing.
